pages.text: $(o)"The simple difference between a mirror and a reflection is that the mirror is just a possible frame. The difference between a mirror and the Mirror is that a mirror is made out of metal and glass, while the Mirror is the reflection of a sun woven out of light, though the Mirror itself is woven and not even a frame. Short, the Mirror is a paradox, its name at least."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Reflection of the Sun$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Crystal$() aspect.

To reflect the sun, the occultist will need a $(l:shaping/entry_mirror)Mirror of the Soul$() to be held towards the sun, while holding an $(l:alchemy/entry_gem)Arcane Gem$() in the off-hand. The pseudo-emotion of laughter will need to be present, too.
